project_descr:
MLF Reference N. BRA/DES/72/DEM/305
Demo project to demonstrate an environmentally sound, efficient and cost effective management and disposal of ODS waste management system in Brazil.

outputs.output_descr: This projects was approved at the 72nd ExCom meeting of the MLF Secretariat for the Implementation of the Montreal Protocol for the establishment of ODS Waste Management System.

document_name: PILOT DEMONSTRATION PROJECT ON ODS-WASTE MANAGEMENT AND DISPOSAL
https://info.undp.org/docs/pdc/Documents/BRA/72ExCom_UNDP BRA ODS Waste MgtDisposal Project - FINAL.docx
project_title: bra/14/g72 - ods waste management and disposal
